```{r surv obj, echo = FALSE}
library(survival)
oss_rcvd %>%
    trans_date <- parse_date_time(oss_rcvd$receive_date, "%d/%m/%Y %H:%M:%S") %>%
    filter(agent_code, trans_date) %>%
    group_by(agent_code) %>%
    mutate(start_date = min(trans_date), end_date = min(trans_date)) -> df

```
